name: Sorbet Simulator
description:
Giant scoops of ice scream are scattered in a vast ice desert. You are a tiny human, 1/3 the size of an ice cream scoop. Travel & explore the desert on your skis. If you come across a giant ice cream scoop take your pickaxe and harvest some of the ice cream to collect some of every flavor.

Controls:

W - Push forward

A, D - Turn

S - Slow Down/ Backward

Space - Scoop
